SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Millock, K., & Nauges, C. (2010). Household adoption of water-efficient equipment: the role of socio-economic factors, environmental attitudes and policy. Environmental and Resource Economics, 46(4), 539-565.
Assumptions: 54% applies to several countries surveyed that all are members of the OECD. Since the TAM filters for persons with over US$10,000 GDP/capita using gini data for countries rich and poor, and the countries sampled have average GDP/capita values in excess of this limit, we shall assume that this adoption percent applies to the entire TAM (ie Drawdown Region = "World")
